column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We moved on to a shrimp cocktail for starters
column2: which is (I believe) exactly the same as the offering at Maude's - a good thing. The shrimp were perfect
column3: and the presentation was wonderful. However
column4: we had shellfish tower envy of the tables around us
column5: so we definitely need to try that on a future visit.
